card.title: Description
card.content:
With this button you can
- update the loaded PyMOL scene of the current session.

steps.step: Select a protein from the tree.
Click on |open_in_new_w200|, to load the pymol session of the selected protein.
Click on a scene in the tree you want to update.
Click on |change_circle_w200|, to update/save the selected scene.

details.item: If you performed an operation on the protein directly from PyMOL, such as rotating or moving the viewpoint, you will need to update the scene manually.
Operations such as coloring with the color grid or changing the representation will be automatically saved.
